channel.title: Posts on Justas Dauparas
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Justas Dauparas

item.title: Unsupervised learning
item.description: I will be following the UC Berkeley’s CS294-158 Deep Unsupervised Learning course and sharing my short summaries and takeaways. The course covers Deep Generative Models and Self-supervised Learning with the focus on the theoretical foundations as well as their newly enabled applications. Stay tuned! Topics: Autoregressive Models Lossless Compression Flow Models Latent Variable Models Bits-Back Coding Implicit Models

item.title: Disentangled Representations
item.description: What are disentangled representations? The recent paper “Towards a Definition of Disentangled Representations” lays out a mathematical definition using group and representation theories.
